languages.text: {n}Щелчок — Вигдис перехватывает вокс-канал у Равора.{/n} "Шаттл отстыковался от корабля и направился в сторону мануфакторума Кьявы Гамма. Мне неизвестно, добралось ли судно до поверхности планеты — авгуры потеряли его след. Выйти на связь с господином ван Калоксом также не удалось. Полагаю, дознаватель решил, что происходящее на планете важнее сопровождения Вольного Торговца".

traits.locale_text: "Шаттл отстыковался от корабля и направился в сторону мануфакторума Кьявы Гамма. Мне неизвестно, добралось ли судно до поверхности планеты — авгуры потеряли его след. Выйти на связь с господином ван Калоксом также не удалось. Полагаю, дознаватель решил, что происходящее на планете важнее сопровождения Вольного Торговца".

languages.text: {n}There is an audible click as Vigdis takes over the vox-channel from Ravor.{/n} "The shuttle undocked and headed toward the manufactorum of Kiava Gamma. I do not know if the flyer made it to the surface of the planet — the augurs lost track of it. We also failed to establish a vox-connection with van Calox. I believe the Interrogator has decided that what is happening on the planet is more important than providing escort to the Rogue Trader."
languages.original_text: {n}Щелчок — Вигдис перехватывает вокс-канал у Равора.{/n} "Шаттл отстыковался от корабля и направился в сторону мануфакторума Кьявы Гамма. Мне неизвестно, добралось ли судно до поверхности планеты — авгуры потеряли его след. Выйти на связь с господином ван Калоксом также не удалось. Полагаю, дознаватель решил, что происходящее на планете важнее сопровождения Вольного Торговца".

traits.locale_text: "The shuttle undocked and headed towards manufactorum of Kiava Gamma. I' m not aware whether the flyer made it to the surface of the planet — the augurs lost track of it. We also failed to establish a vox connection with van Calox. I believe the interrogator has decided that what is happening on the planet is more important than escorting a Rogue Trader."

"The shuttle undocked and headed towards manufactorum of Kiava Gamma. I' m not aware whether the flyer made it to the surface of the planet — the augurs lost track of it. We also failed to establish a vox connection with van Calox. I believe the interrogator has decided that what is happening on the planet is more important than escorting a Rogue Trader."

I believe the Interrogator has decided that what is happening on the planet is more important than providing escort to the Rogue Trader."

I do not know if the flyer made it to the surface of the planet — the augurs lost track of it. We also failed to establish a vox-connection with van Calox. I do not know if the flyer made it to the surface of the planet — the augurs lost track of it. We also failed to establish a vox-connection with van Calox. I believe the Interrogator has decided that what is happening on the planet is more important than providing escort to the Rogue Trader."

languages.text: {n}维格迪斯从雷沃那里接管了音阵频道，音阵系统中传来了明显的咔哒声。{/n}“穿梭机离开虚空舰之后，便向基亚瓦伽马星的制造工厂驶去。我不确定穿梭机是否已经抵达星球表面。俄歇矩阵失去了那艘飞船的踪迹，我们也未能与冯·卡洛克斯取得联系。我相信，那位审讯官认为那颗行星上发生的事情，比护送行商浪人更加重要。”
languages.original_text: {n}There is an audible click as Vigdis takes over the vox-channel from Ravor.{/n} "The shuttle undocked and headed toward the manufactorum of Kiava Gamma. I do not know if the flyer made it to the surface of the planet — the augurs lost track of it. We also failed to establish a vox-connection with van Calox. I believe the Interrogator has decided that what is happening on the planet is more important than providing escort to the Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: {n}维格迪斯从雷沃那里接管了音阵频道，音阵系统中传来了明显的咔哒声。{/n}“穿梭机离开虚空舰之后，便向基亚瓦伽马星的制造工厂驶去。我不确定穿梭机是否已经抵达星球表面。俄歇矩阵失去了那艘飞船的踪迹，我们也未能与冯·卡洛克斯取得联系。我相信，那位审讯官认为那颗行星上发生的事情，比护送行商浪人更加重要。”

languages.text: {n}Con un sonoro chasquido, Vigdis toma el control del canal de voco de Ravor.{/n} «La lanzadera se desacopló y tomó rumbo al manufactorum de Kiava Gamma. No sé si el transporte llegó a la superficie del planeta; los augures han perdido su rastro. Tampoco conseguimos establecer una conexión de voco con van Calox. Creo que el interrogador ha decidido que lo que ocurra en el planeta es más importante que escoltar a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente».
languages.original_text: {n}There is an audible click as Vigdis takes over the vox-channel from Ravor.{/n} "The shuttle undocked and headed toward the manufactorum of Kiava Gamma. I do not know if the flyer made it to the surface of the planet — the augurs lost track of it. We also failed to establish a vox-connection with van Calox. I believe the Interrogator has decided that what is happening on the planet is more important than providing escort to the Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: {n}Con un sonoro chasquido, Vigdis toma el control del canal de voco de Ravor.{/n} «La lanzadera se desacopló y tomó rumbo al manufactorum de Kiava Gamma. No sé si el transporte llegó a la superficie del planeta; los augures han perdido su rastro. Tampoco conseguimos establecer una conexión de voco con van Calox. Creo que el interrogador ha decidido que lo que ocurra en el planeta es más importante que escoltar a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente».

languages.text: {n}Es ertönt ein hörbares Klicken, als Vigdis den Vox-Kanal von Ravor übernimmt.{/n} "Das Shuttle hat abgedockt und ist in Richtung des Manufactorums von Kiava Gamma geflogen. Ich weiß nicht, ob er es bis zur Oberfläche des Planeten geschafft hat ... die Auguren haben ihn aus den Augen verloren. Es ist uns auch nicht gelungen, eine Vox-Verbindung mit van Calox herzustellen. Ich glaube, der Interrogator hat beschlossen, dass das, was auf dem Planeten passiert, wichtiger ist als die Unterstützung {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin}."
languages.original_text: {n}There is an audible click as Vigdis takes over the vox-channel from Ravor.{/n} "The shuttle undocked and headed toward the manufactorum of Kiava Gamma. I do not know if the flyer made it to the surface of the planet — the augurs lost track of it. We also failed to establish a vox-connection with van Calox. I believe the Interrogator has decided that what is happening on the planet is more important than providing escort to the Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: {n}There is an audible click as Vigdis takes over the vox-channel from Ravor.{/n} "The shuttle undocked and headed toward the manufactorum of Kiava Gamma. I do not know if the flyer made it to the surface of the planet — the augurs lost track of it. We also failed to establish a vox-connection with van Calox. I believe the Interrogator has decided that what is happening on the planet is more important than providing escort to the Rogue Trader."

languages.text: {n}Vigdis prend le relais de Ravor sur le canal-vox avec un clic audible.{/n} « La navette a quitté le bord avant de prendre la direction du manufactorum de Kiava Gamma. Les augures ayant perdu sa trace, j'ignore si le pilote a atteint la surface. Nous avons également échoué à établir une connexion-vox avec van Calox. Je soupçonne que l'interrogateur estime que ce qui se passe sur la planète est plus important que de servir d'escorte {mf|au libre-marchand|à la libre-marchande}. »
languages.original_text: {n}There is an audible click as Vigdis takes over the vox-channel from Ravor.{/n} "The shuttle undocked and headed toward the manufactorum of Kiava Gamma. I do not know if the flyer made it to the surface of the planet — the augurs lost track of it. We also failed to establish a vox-connection with van Calox. I believe the Interrogator has decided that what is happening on the planet is more important than providing escort to the Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vigdis prend le relais de Ravnor sur le canal-vox avec un clic audible.{/n} « La navette a quitté le bord avant de prendre la direction du manufactorum de Kiava Gamma. Les augures ayant perdu sa trace, j'ignore si le pilote a atteint la surface. Nous avons également échoué à établir une connexion-vox avec van Calox. Je soupçonne que l'interrogateur estime que ce qui se passe sur la planète est plus important que de servir d'escorte {mf|au libre-marchand|à la libre-marchande}. »

languages.text: {n}カチリと音がして、ヴィグディスがラヴォアからヴォクス通信を引き継いだ。{/n}「シャトルはドッキングを解除して、キアヴァ・ガンマの聖工場へ向かいました。乗船者が地上に降り立ったかは分かりません…スキャナーでは追えませんでした。また、ヴァン・カロックスとのヴォクス接続も確立できませんでした。インテロゲイターは、自由開拓者を護衛するよりも優先すべきことが、地上で起きていると判断したのではないでしょうか」
languages.original_text: {n}There is an audible click as Vigdis takes over the vox-channel from Ravor.{/n} "The shuttle undocked and headed toward the manufactorum of Kiava Gamma. I do not know if the flyer made it to the surface of the planet — the augurs lost track of it. We also failed to establish a vox-connection with van Calox. I believe the Interrogator has decided that what is happening on the planet is more important than providing escort to the Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: {n}カチリと音がして、ヴィグディスがラヴォアからヴォクス通信を引き継いだ。{/n}「シャトルはドッキングを解除して、キアヴァ・ガンマの聖工場へ向かいました。乗船者が地上に降り立ったかは分かりません…スキャナーでは追えませんでした。また、ヴァン・カロックスとのヴォクス接続も確立できませんでした。インテロゲイターは、自由開拓者を護衛するよりも優先すべきことが、地上で起きていると判断したのではないでしょうか」

languages.text: {n}Ravor'un yerine Vigdis'in kanala girişiyle vokstan bir tık sesi geliyor.{/n} "Mekik, gemiden ayrılıp Kiava Gama'nın manufaktorumuna doğru yol almış. Mekikteki şahsın gezegen yüzeyine iniş yapıp yapmadığını bilmiyoruz, alametler izini kaybetti. Van Calox'la voks bağlantısı da kuramadık. Sorgucu, gezegende olanların Hür Tacir'e eşlik etmekten daha çok önem arz ettiğine karar vermiş olsa gerek."
languages.original_text: {n}There is an audible click as Vigdis takes over the vox-channel from Ravor.{/n} "The shuttle undocked and headed toward the manufactorum of Kiava Gamma. I do not know if the flyer made it to the surface of the planet — the augurs lost track of it. We also failed to establish a vox-connection with van Calox. I believe the Interrogator has decided that what is happening on the planet is more important than providing escort to the Rogue Trader."
